reference.shortdesc: The subjectCell element contains subjects that are associated with topics in the first column of the row in the topicSubjectTable. The subjects themselves have no defined relationship across columns, other than the fact that they apply to the same content.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subjectCell element is specialized from relcell. It is defined in the classification-domain module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and . This element also uses scope, format, and type from .
